actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Community Development Banking and Financial Institutions Act of 1994 with respect to population outmigration levels in rural areas.

summary.text: CDFI Technical Corrections Act - Amends the Community Development Banking and Financial Institutions Act of 1994 to include within the definition of "investment area" one that: (1) is located outside of a metropolitan statistical area; and (2) experienced a net migration loss of at least ten percent between 1980 and 1990.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Community Development Banking and Financial Institutions Act of 1994 with respect to population outmigration levels in rural areas.
